column3: str
Greetings! Is there something you want to ask about the Goldsmiths' Guild?
What will you ask?
What do you do here?
What is goldsmithing?
Nothing.
Can I have another set of earrings?
People call me Mistress Serendipity, but you can call me Sera!
I was recently appointed guildmaster, so this is all still quite new to me. My predecessor abruptly retired, you see...but that's a long, sordid story that I'm sure you'd rather not hear.
Now, I may not have much experience managing people, but I <Emphasis>am</Emphasis> a very good goldsmith─even if I do say so myself! Those who train under me are guaranteed to learn a thing or two!
Though we're called <Emphasis>gold</Emphasis>smiths, we actually work with various kinds of precious metals and gemstones, all of which are abundant in Thanalan.
Smelting, casting, cutting, polishing─we use all these techniques to craft beautiful baubles that delight the eyes.
Mind you, the things we make aren't simply for show─a great many possess magical properties. And of course, we craft scepters and staves that thaumaturges use to channel their magicks.
When you think about all the variety goldsmithing has to offer, it's really quite exciting!
You want <Emphasis>what</Emphasis>!? You can't be serious! <Emphasis>Gods</Emphasis>...
Just this once, but remember─life is not a minstrel's song, and you aren't some chosen hero. So don't go around expecting people to forgive you no matter the reckless, irresponsible things you do.
Why, hello there, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>. How is our little princess doing?
Sorry, sorry. That was a bit rude of me, wasn't it. How are <Emphasis>you</Emphasis> doing?
Ah! <Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>! How's every little thing? You haven't been trying to repair mammets behind my back, have you?
<Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>! Are the rumors true? Are you the victim of a vast conspiracy!? Oh dear, I probably shouldn't speak so loudly...
I've given thought to how we might distract your pursuers. Perhaps a mammet fashioned in your image which nods at regular intervals? No? Hmmm...I was rather proud of that idea...
What will you ask?
How fares the guild?
What is goldsmithing?
Nothing.
Can I have another set of earrings?

So very, very busy! Our members are working day and night to fill commissions for clients throughout Eorzea, and of course I must supervise. I swear, sometimes it feels as though I never leave this spot!
I like that it keeps me occupied. When it's not so busy, I start to wonder about silly things, like if he would've really pulled the trigger...
Perhaps I'm due for a sabbatical. I've been thinking about it more ever since a client of ours invited me to his beachside holdings in eastern La Noscea.

Of course, the moment I tell Gigi about Gegeruju's offer, he begins raving about “secrets and lies” again. I mean, I know Gigi was right about Robert or whatever his name was, but what ulterior motives could Gegeruju possibly have?
Ahaha─ Oh, you're serious. Well, if you really want me to explain it to you...
Though we're called <Emphasis>gold</Emphasis>smiths, we actually work with various kinds of precious metals and gemstones, all of which are abundant in Thanalan.
Smelting, casting, cutting, polishing─we use all these techniques to craft beautiful baubles that delight the eyes.
Mind you, the things we make aren't simply for show─a great many possess magical properties. And of course, we craft scepters and staves that thaumaturges use to channel their magicks.
...Out of curiosity, are you feeling well? You didn't hit your head on something, did you? No? Hmmm... Maybe you don't remember doing it...?
Greetings! Is there something you want to ask about the Goldsmiths' Guild?
